ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p:
Most of the content of this report was included in a not-peer-reviewed open-access preprint
86 . This research was funded by the Texas A&M University System Chancellor's Research Initiative (CRI) for the Center for Computational Systems Biology at Prairie View University (D.A.I.). Initial experiments were funded by the National Institutes of Health, grant number 5R01HL092001 (D.A.I.). B.A. acknowledges funding from Competitiveness Operational Programme 2014â€“2020 project P_37_675 (contract no. 146/2016), Priority Axis 1, Action 1.1.4, co-financed by the European Funds for Regional Development and Romanian Government funds. The content of this publication does not necessarily reflect the official position of the Founders.
